Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a small business lease program for establishing an environment for fair negotiations in the commercial lease renewal process in order to determine reasonable lease terms
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a small business lease program for establishing an environment for fair negotiations in the commercial lease renewal process in order to determine reasonable lease terms.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a small business lease program for establishing an environment for fair negotiations in the commercial lease renewal process in order to determine reasonable lease terms
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Creating a small business lease program for establishing an environment for fair negotiations in the commercial lease renewal process in order to determine reasonable lease terms.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a small business lease program for establishing an environment for fair negotiations in the commercial lease renewal process in order to determine reasonable lease terms
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a small business lease program for establishing an environment for fair negotiations in the commercial lease renewal process in order to determine reasonable lease terms.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Speaker Johnson, Lander, Yeger, Levine, Powers, Chin, Rodriguez, Kallos and Cohen.
